body.p: A boxed every offers a visual representation of an iterator statement. For the every loop, the right part of the every displays the iterator variable name. The second row holds an expression representing the collection that will be iterated over. The expression in the in row MUST resolve to a collection. The last line is an expression that will be evaluated on each item. The expression defined in the satisfies must resolve to a boolean.

fig.title: Every expression of Will Fly Together decision

body.note: This feature was introduced as part of the IBM BAMOE 9.1 and DMN 1.5 releases.
